It’s where you’ll find the funniest, most informative and inspiring images, 
memes, GIFs, and visual stories served up in an endless stream of 
bite-sized fun. Powered by a passionate community of people from all around 
the world, anyone can join to share cool stuff and vote the best to the 
top. You’ll always find something on Imgur to make you smile and brighten 
your day.

descrip: Imgur is a popular image sharing and hosting site that is quite popular among individuals and social media sites. Learn how to use it properly here.
title: What is Imgur? The Definitive Guide to Imgur[2021]

descrip:
![image](https://i.imgur.com/n744BL9.png)

## API Status
Status for the API can be found at [status.imgur.com](http://status.imgur.com)!

## Getting Started
Imgurs API exposes the entire Imgur infrastructure via a standardized programmatic interface. Using Imgur's API, you can do just about anything you can do on imgur.com, while using your programming language of choice. The Imgur API is a RESTful API based on HTTP requests and JSON responses.

This version of the API, version 3, uses OAuth 2.0
title: Imgur API
